title: n1betscam
author: n1betscam
content: Hi,I have account on www.n1bet.com I make 4 deposit - 2400e, i make 30 bets and win. I have on account 7100e. They hold my money over 10 days, my account is fully verify, they want video call, they confirmed me skype call, but nobody call me. I send them all documents for full verification. I have all proofs from chat and from mail. They stole my win and my profit. They ignore me by mail, support is very bad, always same answer. Skip this bookies, if you woudnt lose money. I report this case to Curacao egaming, GoodLuckMate, Interpol and oddsportal.com.Have you any more suggestion for help?Some proofs here:https://ibb.co/YLLsyMvhttps://ibb.co/kDbXrh4

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Hey. Lock the same thread(https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5417937.msg61163567#msg61163567) first before you start this new topic. And also you can just simply move the topic using the move button on the bottom of the thread. Lock button is also on the bottom part to avoid redundant discussion on same subject matter. You are spamming the forum if you open same topic at the same time even on different board.Make sure to follow the proper format for scam accusation thread to make it more simple to understand! Btw this casino is doesn’t have any representative here. Your best chance to do is to report it on Askgambler since they have the power to file a official complaint against online casino. That amount is already significant how the heck you deposit on that unknown casino using huge amount without doing background check?

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: N1bet is operated by Dama N.VThere are 68(!) Dama N.V casinos listed at askgamblers.There are dozens of complaints but at the end they pay everyone.If i was you, i would post my complaint here:https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/reviews/n1bet-casinoThey have a representative there so they will respond you.Don't mention sportsbetting as askgablers deals only with casino complaints. Wrote that N1bet is stalling your withdrawal etc.GL, hope you get paid mate.

They hold my money over 10 days, my account is fully verify, they want video call, they confirmed me skype call, but nobody call me. I send them all documents for full verification. I report this case to Curacao egaming, GoodLuckMate, Interpol and oddsportal.com.Have you any more suggestion for help?Some proofs here:https://ibb.co/YLLsyMvhttps://ibb.co/kDbXrh4I think the steps to create a thread concerning your accusation were given to you in your first thread in gambling board. And yet you didn't do as it was instructed. And also one thread is not allowed to appear twice in different board, so you have to lock one which is the first one in gambling board. And also follow the proper format that was given to you to follow in your first thread.Don't reply to follow the instructions but edit your OP here.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: spyrosc200 on October 22, 2022, 10:11:26 AMThere are dozens of complaints but at the end they pay everyone.This is eventually a good thing. A casino can restrict their clients account if they find anything suspicious but after investigation if they return the money they owe to their clients then the casino is doing right thing. Honestly speaking I never heard of the n1bet, the logo seems unknown too to me. On the other hand OP only posted two screenshots and some words which make it difficult to understand the validity of his case. Do n1bet have an account on the forum?

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 22, 2022, 10:29:08 AMDo n1bet have an account on the forum?I don't think they have. I found no mention of n1bet on the bitcointalk forum prior to this accusation by the OP.As it looks, n1bet is a relatively new gambling site. Although the domain looks old, this casino was first mentioned on the web only last year.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Marvelman on October 22, 2022, 11:46:31 AMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 22, 2022, 10:29:08 AMDo n1bet have an account on the forum?I don't think they have. I found no mention of n1bet on the bitcointalk forum prior to this accusation by the OP.As it looks, n1bet is a relatively new gambling site. Although the domain looks old, this casino was first mentioned on the web only last year. No, it's not a new casino, it's already running for four years, I've checked it on WhoisDomain:n1bet.comRegistrar:GoDaddy.com, LLCRegistered On:2018-08-25Expires On:2024-08-25Updated On:2021-04-06They just don't want to promote their casino here, because they know that this forum is very active in giving bad feedback when they scam their players, we are only aware of casinos that are already here but there are still a lot of casinos online that we have not read but already running for several years like this casino.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: This domain was first updated on Updated Date: 2020-05-22T14:24:34Z. It is true that they continue their activities even earlier. But I also don't have any confirmed information to give a specific launch date. Whether their website is new or old can only be guessed, because only the owner of the casino can tell what the launch date was.QuoteDomain Name: n1bet.comRegistry Domain ID: 2302217675_DOMAIN_COM-VRSNRegistrar WHOIS Server: whois.godaddy.comRegistrar URL: https://www.godaddy.comUpdated Date: 2020-05-22T14:24:34ZCreation Date: 2018-08-25T13:49:23ZRegistrar Registration Expiration Date: 2024-08-25T13:49:23ZRegistrar: GoDaddy.com, LLChttps://www.whois.com/whois/n1bet.com

I have seen that still, the same post is on the gambling board. Would you like to lock the thread which is on the gambling thread? There is no reason to make several posts on separate boards. You should lock one and continue another. As it is regarding scams you should continue this thread and lock the post which you have posted on the gambling board.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I know reviews from trustpilot are not to be completely trust, but it has a handful of reviews there, most of them being negative - https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.n1bet.comMy gut tells me the casino is a complete scam. How did you land on this scam sportsbook OP, and why did you prefer using it compared to the reputable ones we already have?

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on October 22, 2022, 02:07:06 PMQuote from: Marvelman on October 22, 2022, 11:46:31 AMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 22, 2022, 10:29:08 AMDo n1bet have an account on the forum?I don't think they have. I found no mention of n1bet on the bitcointalk forum prior to this accusation by the OP.As it looks, n1bet is a relatively new gambling site. Although the domain looks old, this casino was first mentioned on the web only last year. No, it's not a new casino, it's already running for four years, I've checked it on Whois/cut/No, you are mistaken. As I said, the domain is old, but the casino site is not. You can check the web archives on the Wayback Machine to see how it looked before 2021. As far as I can tell, there was no website on that domain (besides the generic "domain for sale") before then. https://web.archive.org/web/20180109222353/http://n1bet.com/Also, the oldest reviews on TrustPilot date from December 2021.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 22, 2022, 10:29:08 AMQuote from: spyrosc200 on October 22, 2022, 10:11:26 AMThere are dozens of complaints but at the end they pay everyone.This is eventually a good thing. I am having a second thought. spyrosc200 how did you know that they are paying everyone eventually? Giving us some reference will help.Quote from: JeromeTash on October 22, 2022, 09:58:09 PMI know reviews from trustpilot are not to be completely trustA project can request their admin to remove a negative feedback and they moderate the reviews in the favor of the project. That's how TrustPilot run their business having the projects in their side. So anything from those review sites are massively manipulated.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Since the casino is not officially represented on Bitcointalk, your only option is to go through alternative sources, like the beforementioned AskGamblers.I am looking at the screenshot you posted in OP showing the profile page of your account. Nowhere does it say that your account is KYC verified or that your documents were checked and accepted. I don't think it can be used as proof that you went through identity verification. All we see is that 7 .jpg files were uploaded but that's it.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on October 22, 2022, 09:58:09 PMI know reviews from trustpilot are not to be completely trust, but it has a handful of reviews there, most of them being negative - https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.n1bet.comMy gut tells me the casino is a complete scam. How did you land on this scam sportsbook OP, and why did you prefer using it compared to the reputable ones we already have?You are right that trust on Trustpilot is manipulated. But the manipulated feedback is only positive, not negative. Manipulated feedback is only positive as the site owner buys positive feedback. But when there is negative feedback that should be considered as legit feedback as no site owner buy any negative feedback.

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: Anyone can monitor the outcome of the complaint here:https://www.askgamblers.com/casino-complaints/n1bet-casino-dispute-withdraw-verification-stalling-and-long-wait

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: Saw at askgamblers that they paid you 2.5k for now, that's good news mate

comments.author: n1betscam
comments.body: My case is resolved. They pay me till today 2.500euro. I exceed weekly limit. But is okay. Thank you very much for help. Thank you very much for askgamblers.
